name: Death Valley
description:
This is a casual game. The game features a blue background and a white ball as the protagonist, which travels along the road race track. The road is covered with obstacles, and the white ball needs to keep moving to avoid obstacles, trying to get as many health balls as possible to earn points. Cool special effects and stimulating sound effects bring you a different experience. This game may seem simple, but in reality it's not as simple as it seems. Come and give it a try!

The gameplay of this game

Ball moving left=←

Ball moving to the right=→

The ball will continue to move forward. You need to adjust the position of the ball carefully. When you hit an obstacle, you will fail!

Game features

The gameplay is simple, the graphics are exquisite, and it can bring players a thrilling feeling!

The ball moves at a fast speed, which greatly enhances the player's reaction ability!
